attributes.action: Ask parliament to question the DUP about same sex marriage, in Northern Ireland.
attributes.background: Arlene Foster and the DUP have rejected the right of Homosexuals to marriage, in Northern Ireland.  This right is enjoyed in all other parts of Britain and i ask that the DUP explain their 'Religious over political' stance. Which has been enforced, without debate, in Stormont.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about party political issues.
